admin.text: Welcome to the Galaxy! I'm your President, Zaphod Beeblebrox!
Remember: Don't Panic, and always know where your towel is!
The answer to life, the universe, and everything is... 42!

user1.text: Hello, I'm Arthur Dent. My planet was recently demolished.
Has anyone seen my house? It was on Earth before the bypass.
I never did get the hang of Thursdays...

user2.text: Greetings from Trillian! Exploring the galaxy one planet at a time.
The probability calculations for this message are quite fascinating.
Sometimes I miss Earth, but the universe is so much bigger!
